testsuite.name: tests.SD1_Successful_Login

testcase.name: test_SD1_Successful_Login
testcase.system-out: 1. Navigate to: https://www.saucedemo.com 2. Write username: 'standard_user' 3. Write password: 'secret_sauce' 4. click 'Login' button 5. Verify Url changed to '/inventory.html' 6. Verificar que se muestra el título 'Products'
